title: Replays
body: Is there a way to download replays so i can watch them outside the client? I like to watch my replays but sometimes it is a lot easier to watch replays away from my computer?

replies.body: Replays are saved server-side and accessible only through the match history page.  Per the [replays ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips)guide, what you can do is create highlights and record, which will then save to your document folder.  Let me know if it helps!
This helps a lot, Thanks so much for the help!
